mapper.select: select * from faq order by faqId desc
mapper.insert: insert into faq(faqTitle, faqContents, img) values (#{faqTitle}, #{faqContents}, #{img})
mapper.update: update faq set faqTitle = #{faqTitle}, faqContents = #{faqContents}, img = #{img} where faqId = #{faqId}
mapper.select: select * from faq order by faqId desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
mapper.update: update faq set viewCount = viewCount + 1 where faqId = ${faqId}
mapper.select: select * from faq_reply where faqId = #{faqId} order by wDate
